      • crossSign

        public static double crossSign(Line line,
                               Point point)
        Returns the signed cross product of a line and a point, such that the relative position of a point to a line can be determined.
        Parameters:
        line - The line forming the first vector, taken from Point 1 to Point 2
        point - The point to form the second vector, taken from line1.point1 to this point.
        Returns:
        1 if the point is on one side, -1 if on the other, 0 if exactly on the line.

      • vectorExtend

        public static Line vectorExtend(Line line,
                                double lengthFinal,
                                Size size)
        Extends a line as a vector, increasing the Euclidean distance of point 2 from point 1 by moving only point 2.
        Parameters:
        line - The line to be modified.
        lengthFinal - The final desired Euclidean length of the line
        size - The size of the working image
        Returns:
        A new Line object of the appropriate length

      • vectorExtend

        public static java.util.List<Line> vectorExtend(java.util.List<Line> lines,
                                                double lengthFinal,
                                                Size size)
        Extends a list of lines as vector, increasing the Euclidean distance of point 2 from point 1 by moving only point 2.
        Parameters:
        lines - The lines to be modified
        lengthFinal - The final desired Euclidean length of the line
        size - The size of the working image
        Returns:
        A new list of lines object of the appropriate length

      • linearExtend

        public static Line linearExtend(Line line,
                                double scale,
                                Size size)
        Linearly extends a line in both directions by the given portion of its length
        Parameters:
        line - The line to be modified
        scale - The length of the line will be extended by the line's length divided by twice this value
        size - The size of the image
        Returns:

      • linearExtend

        public static java.util.List<Line> linearExtend(java.util.List<Line> lines,
                                                double scale,
                                                Size size)
        Linearly extends a lines in both directions by the given portion of its length
        Parameters:

        scale - The length of the lines will be extended by the line's length divided by twice this value
        size - The size of the image
        Returns:

      • constructLine

        public static Line constructLine(Point point,
                                 double angle,
                                 double length)
        Constructs a line given a center point, an angle in the plane, and a length
        Parameters:
        point - The center point of the line
        angle - The desired angle of the line, in degrees
        length - The desired length of the line, in pixels
        Returns:
        The constructed line

      • getOpenCvLines

        public static java.util.List<Line> getOpenCvLines(Mat original,
                                                  int scale,
                                                  double minLength)
        Modern OpenCV line segment detection - far better than Canny, but must be carefully adjusted.
        Parameters:
        original - The original image to be scanned, as an RGB image
        scale - The factor by which the image is to be downscaled
        minLength - The minimum line segment length to be returned
        Returns:
        A List of Lines found
